attributes.action: stop existing drivers of diesel cars from being taxed .
attributes.background:
stop existing drivers of diesel cars from being taxed under
some plans by councils.
drivers were unaware when purchased, that diesel cars etch would be found to be polluting the environment.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action your petition is asking for. Car tax (vehicle excise duty) is the responsibility of the Government, not local councils. 

If you're concerned about something that your local council is doing, you could contact a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
